title: Real Time Economics: Trump Sees Trade Strategy Working | More Pressure on China | Record Streak for Jobless Claims
text: This is the web version of the WSJ’s daily economic newsletter. You can sign up for daily delivery here. In today’s issue, the Trump administration applies more pressure on China, China and the U.S. seek economic allies, the trade gap soars, Europe and oil markets worry, U.S. wage gains are picking up (a little), and the number   Study Shows Big Benefits to Chinese Companies From Joint Ventures with U.S. Firms
